verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> See, <WH7200> I have made <WH5414> you a god <WH430> to Pharaoh: <WH6547> and Aaron <WH175> your brother <WH251> shall be your prophet. <WH5030>

You shall speak <WH1696> all <WH3605> that I command <WH6680> you: and Aaron <WH175> your brother <WH251> shall speak <WH1696> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> that he send <WH7971> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of his land. <WH776>
And I will harden <WH7185> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart, <WH3820> and multiply <WH7235> my signs <WH226> and my wonders <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

But Pharaoh <WH6547> shall not listen <WH8085> to you, that I may lay <WH5414> my hand <WH3027> on Egypt, <WH4714> and bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> my armies, <WH6635> and my people <WH5971> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by great <WH1419> judgments. <WH8201>

And the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD, <WH3068> when I stretch <WH5186> forth my hand <WH3027> on Egypt, <WH4714> and bring <WH3318> out the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from among <WH8432> them.
And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> did <WH6213> as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> them, so <WH3651> did <WH6213> they.

And Moses <WH4872> was fourscore <WH8084> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> and Aaron <WH175> fourscore <WH8084> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> when they spoke <WH1696> to Pharaoh. <WH6547>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

When <WH3588> Pharaoh <WH6547> shall speak <WH1696> to you, saying, <WH559> Show <WH5414> a miracle <WH4159> for you: then you shall say <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> Take <WH3947> your rod, <WH4294> and cast <WH7993> it before <WH6440> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and it shall become <WH1961> a serpent. <WH8577>

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> went <WH935> in to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and they did <WH6213> so <WH3651> as the LORD <WH3068> had commanded: <WH6680> and Aaron <WH175> cast <WH7993> down his rod <WH4294> before <WH6440> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and before <WH6440> his servants, <WH5650> and it became <WH1961> a serpent. <WH8577>

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> also <WH1571> called <WH7121> the wise <WH2450> men and the sorcerers: <WH3784> now the magicians <WH2748> of Egypt, <WH4714> they also <WH1571> did <WH6213> in like <WH3651> manner <WH3651> with their enchantments. <WH3858>
For they cast <WH7993> down every <WH376> man <WH376> his rod, <WH4294> and they became <WH1961> serpents: <WH8577> but Aaron's <WH175> rod <WH4294> swallowed <WH1104> up their rods. <WH4294>
And he hardened <WH2388> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart, <WH3820> that he listened <WH8085> not to them; as the LORD <WH3068> had said. <WH1696>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820> is hardened, <WH3515> he refuses <WH3985> to let the people <WH5971> go. <WH7971>

Get <WH3212> you to Pharaoh <WH6547> in the morning; <WH1242> see, <WH2009> he goes <WH3318> out to the water; <WH4325> and you shall stand <WH5324> by the river's <WH2975> brink <WH8193> against <WH7125> he come; <WH7125> and the rod <WH4294> which <WH834> was turned <WH2015> to a serpent <WH5175> shall you take <WH3947> in your hand. <WH3027>

And you shall say <WH559> to him, The LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680> has sent <WH7971> me to you, saying, <WH559> Let my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> that they may serve <WH5647> me in the wilderness: <WH4057> and, behold, <WH2009> till now <WH5704> <WH3541> you would not hear. <WH8085>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> In this <WH2063> you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD: <WH3068> behold, <WH2009> I will smite <WH5221> with the rod <WH4294> that is in my hand <WH3027> on the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> are in the river, <WH2975> and they shall be turned <WH2015> to blood. <WH1818>

And the fish <WH1710> that is in the river <WH2975> shall die, <WH4191> and the river <WH2975> shall stink; <WH887> and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall loathe <WH3811> to drink <WH8354> of the water <WH4325> of the river. <WH2975>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Say <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> Take <WH3947> your rod, <WH4294> and stretch <WH5186> out your hand <WH3027> on the waters <WH4325> of Egypt, <WH4714> on their streams, <WH5104> on their rivers, <WH2975> and on their ponds, <WH98> and on all <WH3605> their pools <WH4723> of water, <WH4325> that they may become <WH1961> blood; <WH1818> and that there may be blood <WH1818> throughout all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> both in vessels of wood, <WH6086> and in vessels of stone. <WH68>

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> did <WH6213> so, <WH3651> as the LORD <WH3068> commanded; <WH6680> and he lifted <WH7311> up the rod, <WH4294> and smote <WH5221> the waters <WH4325> that were in the river, <WH2975> in the sight <WH5869> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> and in the sight <WH5869> of his servants; <WH5650> and all <WH3605> the waters <WH4325> that were in the river <WH2975> were turned <WH2015> to blood. <WH1818>

And the fish <WH1710> that was in the river <WH2975> died; <WH4191> and the river <WH2975> stank, <WH887> and the Egyptians <WH4714> could <WH3201> not drink <WH8354> of the water <WH4325> of the river; <WH2975> and there was blood <WH1818> throughout all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And the magicians <WH2748> of Egypt <WH4714> did <WH6213> so <WH3651> with their enchantments: <WH3909> and Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820> was hardened, <WH2388> neither <WH3808> did he listen <WH8085> to them; as the LORD <WH3068> had said. <WH1696>
And Pharaoh <WH6547> turned <WH6437> and went <WH935> into <WH413> his house, <WH1004> neither <WH3808> did he set <WH7896> his heart <WH3820> to this <WH2063> also. <WH1571>

And all <WH3605> the Egyptians <WH4714> dig <WH2658> round <WH5439> about the river <WH2975> for water <WH4325> to drink; <WH8354> for they could <WH3201> not drink <WH8354> of the water <WH4325> of the river. <WH2975>
And seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> were fulfilled, <WH4390> after <WH310> that the LORD <WH3068> had smitten <WH5221> the river. <WH2975>
